page.title: 15BRICKHILL SCHOOL JUNE FAIR
page.content: Every year{Brickhill Middle School}has its{June Fair}to raise money for school equipment. This year we had a bouncy castle,an ice cream van, performances,a Grand Draw and sales. We had the sales in the gym where we have our assemblies. Stalls were put up and second hand things like perfumes plants and tinned food were sold.Outside we had performances like the Brollies dance and movement club, a brass band,and the Sea Scouts marching.There was an art competition which most of the school took part in.In some class rooms there were things like book stalls. In an end class room there were people making lace and people at a stall who were selling earrings, talc and lots of other things. At the end of the June Fair we had a Grand Draw. The first prize was Â£100.
